类的使用
org.apache.catalina.authenticator.SingleSignOn

  • 使用SingleSignOn的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.authenticator
    This package contains Authenticator implementations for the various supported authentication methods (BASIC, DIGEST, and FORM).
    org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator  

    • org.apache.catalina.authenticator中SingleSignOn的使用

      声明为SingleSignOn的org.apache.catalina.authenticator中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected SingleSignOn AuthenticatorBase.sso
      The SingleSignOn implementation in our request processing chain, if there is one.
      参数类型为SingleSignOn的org.apache.catalina.authenticator中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void SingleSignOnEntry.addSession(SingleSignOn sso, java.lang.String ssoId, Session session)
      Adds a Session to the list of those associated with this SSO.

    • org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator中SingleSignOn的使用

      org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator中SingleSignOn的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ClusterSingleSignOn
      A Valve that supports a "single sign on" user experience on each nodes of a cluster, where the security identity of a user who successfully authenticates to one web application is propagated to other web applications and to other nodes cluster in the same security domain.
